full_summary:
====================
### IV Fluids Supply and Stockpile Strategy
#### Tender Reference: WS4054827371-Doc4054920879
#### Publication Date: June 15, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: August 17, 2023, 2:00 PM

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids from qualified suppliers for the supply and stockpiling of IV fluids. The IV fluids are intended for the Department of National Defence (DND) and must meet certain specifications.

#####Procurement Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS4054827371
* **Publication Date:** June 15, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 17, 2023, 2:00 PM
* **UNSPSC Code:** 51000000 (Drugs and Pharmaceutical Products)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Information

**Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16583548](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16583548)

The following trade agreements apply to this tender:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

**Contact Information:**

* Kasandra Eady
* PSPC/SPAC
* kasandra.eady@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Regions and Delivery:
IV fluids will be delivered to the Department of National Defence (DND) in Ontario, with the exception of the National Capital Region (NCR).

Note: the original entry has been reformatted to fit the 400-word limitation, and only the most relevant information has been kept. The UNSPSC code and procurement method have been reformatted for easier reading.
